meanings.definition: A group of extinct herbivorous reptiles with two tusks.
meanings.sent1: Dicynodonts roamed the ancient lands with their unique tusks.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a fascinating skeleton of dicynodonts.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, Sarah dressed up as a playful dicynodont with two tusks.
meanings.sent4: In the world of imagination, dicynodonts symbolize ancient strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The children's book vividly described the gentle nature of dicynodonts.

meanings.definition: The dicynodonts were dominant during the late Permian period.
meanings.sent1: During the late Permian period, dicynodonts ruled the prehistoric world.
meanings.sent2: Fossils of dicynodonts provide valuable insights into the late Permian era.
meanings.sent3: In the history book, the dicynodonts were portrayed as the rulers of their time.
meanings.sent4: The power and influence of dicynodonts in the late Permian period were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the fascinating lives of dicynodonts during the late Permian era.

meanings.definition: Scientists study dicynodont fossils to learn more about prehistoric ecosystems.
meanings.sent1: Researchers carefully examine dicynodont fossils to understand ancient ecosystems.
meanings.sent2: Studying dicynodonts' remains helps scientists piece together prehistoric environments.
meanings.sent3: The classroom erupted in excitement as the teacher revealed a rare dicynodont fossil.
meanings.sent4: Dicynodont fossils act as time capsules, preserving secrets of past ecosystems.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of a new dicynodont fossil shed light on the complexity of prehistoric habitats.
